item.title: Night Ranger - (You Can Still) Rock In America
item.description:
Little sister
by the record machine
A tiny dancer
such a sweet sixteen
She’s goin’ out
she’s gonna party
Tonight
she’s gonna shake
And make it last
all night
Little brother’s got a
drivin’ machine
A fast driver
such a clean machine
They’re going out
they’re gonna
Put out the lights
they gonna
Rock it rock it
rock it
You can still
rock in America
Ah yeah s’alright
you can still
Rock in America
ah yeah all night

rock in America-

Little sister
makes a move
For the door
the door squeaks
She’s on
the second floor
Her daddy wakes
is everything O K?
Not a sound as
she makes her get away
Little brother’s
got it ready to roll
Tires burning
as they head
For the show
light it up
And turn the music
up loud
And rock it rock it
rock it
You can still
rock in America

you can still

ah yeah all night

in America
